name: FRYSK
description:
With the FRYSK app you can play draughts according to the Frisian rules.

A lot of attention has been paid to the graphics, with the aim to make it look beautiful, without any distracting bling-bling.

PLAY

Games can be either for 1 or 2 players, and either with or without a clock. Of course, all the standard features like swapping sides or rotating the board are available.

SETUP

You can setup a position using an intuitive interface.

ANALYZE

FRYSK contains a separate screen for analyzing positions. You can ask the engine for an evaluation.

ANNOTATE

Look through the game you just played, add annotations and email the game notation, or copy it to the clipboard.

DATABASE

Save your games for future reference.

Enjoy!
